original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id =c.UserId AND c.UserId = p.OwnerUserId AND p.OwnerUserId = v.UserId AND v.UserId = b.UserId AND c.Score=1 AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.Score<=29 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 20:40:36' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 20:52:30' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.BountyAmount<=50 AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-08-25 19:05:46' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes<=11 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-31 17:32:56' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-07 16:06:26' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 1

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes <= 11 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-31 17:32:56' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-07 16:06:26')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1.UserId=E5.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.BountyAmount <= 50
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E5.UserId=E3.UserId)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) >= -1 AND CAST(posts.Score AS INTEGER) <= 29 AND (CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 20:40:36' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 20:52:30')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1E5E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E5E3.UserId=E2.OwnerUserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-25 19:05:46'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E3E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E5E3E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E5E3E2.UserId=E4.UserId)
